item.title: Wilderness levers glitch?
item.dc:creator: @noobcoderh2o noobcoderh2o
item.description:
@noobcoderh2o wrote:

pi source
317

Heres my code

if (c.inWild()) { if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,3)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(563,3); c.sendMessage("You need 3 law runes to teleport in wilderness!"); return; } else { c.sendMessage("You need 3 law runes to teleport in wilderness!"); return; } }

So wha it does is it takes your 3 law runes and still doesnt tele you. any fixes?
